translations: [声]转盘（turntable 的复数）；[电子]唱盘

sentences.sentence: Saurez- you mix the tube of the year and become a star of turntables?
sentences.translation: 你能全年混淆音乐，并成为转台上的明星吗？

sentences.sentence: Teenagers bought Technics turntables and dreamed of becoming disc jockeys in Ibiza.
sentences.translation: 伊比沙岛的青少年们购买工艺唱盘机，梦想在成为摇滚音乐演奏者（DJ）。

sentences.sentence: Turntables can be installed to assist in the removal of the bogies to other maintenance areas.
sentences.translation: 还应有转向架转盘将转向架送到其他维修区域去。
